channel.title: Python on Sophia Baca
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Sophia Baca

item.title: Poisson Distributed Forecast
item.description: This is an ongoing project wherein I am exploring methods for generating predictions for discrete time series data. This data falls within the exponential family of probability distributions, as the output event is binary but could occur multiple times within a day.

item.title: NYC Taxi Streamlit
item.description: Recently I have been working with streamlit and azure. I took a sample of the NYC Taxi Dataset from Databricks. I imported it into a Python streamlit project that creates a dashboard that summarizes features.
